definition[0]: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
example[0]: I donâ€™t associate him with energetic sports.
definition[1]: someone who you work or do business with
definition[2]: someone who you work with or do business with
example[2]: He manipulated government funds to benefit himself and his associates.
example[3]: I was recently contacted by a former business associate.
definition[3]: a member of an organization who has some but not all the rights of a full member
example[4]: a senior research associate of the Family and Work Institute
definition[4]: someone who is a member of an organization and has some but not all of the rights that full members have
example[5]: The country has applied for associate membership of the EU.
definition[5]: someone whose job is closely connected to that of someone else and who shares responsibility or authority with them
example[6]: associate curator at the Metropolitan Museum of Art
